duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain knowledge of EDC functionality, establish and maintain relationships with site data & regulatory coordinators, and ensure Quality Control of submitted Case Report Forms (CRFs)
Responsible for regulatory documentation for all assigned sites and study staff, site creation within the EDC, and perform QC audits of the clinical database
Support and adhere to GCP guidelines, FDA, IRB, and HIPPA regulations, and work closely with onsite team to confirm appropriate consenting and documentation prior to data abstraction
Communicate effectively with the research team, investigator(s), study sponsor, and ancillary staff, and provide extensive, informative feedback to the trainee Clinical Research Coordinator

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred and Research Coordinator Certification preferred (SoCRA, ACRP)
